basic.description:
Seminars offered by regular and visiting faculty on Geography topics related to their research interests. Consult the departmental homepage for further details of specific course offerings each academic year.
NOTE    Field trip fees may apply in certain years.
LEARNING HOURS    132 (36S;24Oc;72P)
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Honours Seminar in Human Geography III

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 4 and (a GPA of 2.6 in 24.0 units in GPHY) and (registration in a GPHY Major or Medial (Arts) Plan).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from GPHY401; GPHY402; GPHY403.
